bill_title: clarify the membership of the Open Meeting Commission.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to clarify the membership of the Open Meeting Commission. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That § 1-25-8 be AMENDED: 1-25-8. The South Dakota Open Meeting Commission shall be is comprised of five state's attorneys or deputy state's attorneys appointed by the attorney general. Each commissioner shall serve serves at the pleasure of the attorney general. A The members of the commission shall choose a chair of the commission shall be chosen annually from the membership of the commission by a majority of its members by majority vote.
